name: Cabbage Roll Skillet
ingredients: 1 small-medium cabbage, chopped (2 pounds cabbage before trimming)
2 tablespoons granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda
utensils: Very large skillet, wok, or Dutch oven

instructions.en: Brown ground beef with onion and garlic in a very large skillet, wok, or Dutch oven. Drain fat if desired.
instructions.sk: Na veľmi veľkej panvici, woku alebo liatinovom hrnci opečte mleté mäso s cibuľou a cesnakom. Podľa potreby zlejte tuk.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパン、中華鍋、またはダッチオーブンで挽肉、玉ねぎ、ニンニクを炒めます。必要に応じて脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Stir in remaining ingredients: cabbage, crushed tomatoes, salt, pepper, vinegar, and Splenda.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte zvyšné prísady: kapustu, pretlačené paradajky, soľ, korenie, ocot a Splendu.
instructions.ja: 残りの材料（キャベツ、クラッシュトマト、塩、コショウ、酢、スプレンダ）を加えて混ぜます。

instructions.en: Cover and simmer for 30-40 minutes or until cabbage is tender.
instructions.sk: Prikryte a varte na miernom ohni 30-40 minút alebo kým kapusta nezmäkne.
instructions.ja: 蓋をして30〜40分、またはキャベツが柔らかくなるまで煮込みます。

notes: Makes 6 servings. The original recipe called for diced tomatoes and tomato sauce, but using crushed tomatoes reduces carbs. Water was omitted to further reduce carbs.
